Package cinema

Class Movie

Object
Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Represents a Movie. There can be many movies in a Cinema.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Qwek Jin Kee

      private MovieType movieType

      typeOfMovie - The genre of the Movie.

      director - The director of the Movie.
      casts - The casts of the Movie.
      showStatus - The show status of the Movie.
      ageRating - The age rating of the Movie.

    • updateOverallRating

      public void updateOverallRating()
      Updates the overall rating of the movie. Does nothing when there is less than 2 reviews.
